trans-unit.source: .NET Core
trans-unit.target: .NET 核心

trans-unit.source: .NET Core
trans-unit.target: .NET 核心

trans-unit.source: .NET, .NET Core
trans-unit.target: .NET、.NET Core

trans-unit.source: .NET Core
trans-unit.target: .NET 核心

trans-unit.source: Check out the ["Getting Started" tutorials](getting-started.md) to learn how to create a simple .NET Core application.
trans-unit.target: 簽出[「入門」教學課程](getting-started.md)以了解如何建立簡單的 .NET Core 應用程式。

trans-unit.source: It only takes a few minutes to get your first app up and running.
trans-unit.target: 只需要幾分鐘，您就可以啟動並執行您的第一個應用程式。

trans-unit.source: .NET Core is a general purpose development platform maintained by Microsoft and the .NET community on [GitHub](https://github.com/dotnet/core).
trans-unit.target: .NET Core 是一般用途的開發平台，由 Microsoft 和 [GitHub](https://github.com/dotnet/core) 上的 .NET 社群共同維護。

trans-unit.source: It is cross-platform, supporting Windows, macOS and Linux, and can be used in device, cloud, and embedded/IoT scenarios.
trans-unit.target: 它可以跨平台支援 Windows、macOS 及 Linux，並可用於裝置、雲端和內嵌/IoT 案例。

trans-unit.source: The following characteristics best define .NET Core:
trans-unit.target: 下列特性最能定義 .NET Core：

trans-unit.source: **Flexible deployment:** Can be included in your app or installed side-by-side user- or machine-wide.
trans-unit.target: **彈性的部署︰**可以包含在應用程式內，或任何人、任何機器都可並行安裝。

trans-unit.source: **Cross-platform:** Runs on Windows, macOS and Linux; can be ported to other OSes.
trans-unit.target: **跨平台︰**Windows、macOS 及 Linux 上都可執行，也可以移轉到其他作業系統。

trans-unit.source: The [supported Operating Systems (OS)](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/master/roadmap.md), CPUs and application scenarios will grow over time, provided by Microsoft, other companies, and individuals.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft、其他公司及個人提供的[支援的作業系統 (OS)](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/master/roadmap.md)、Cpu 和應用程式案例，會隨著時間成長。

trans-unit.source: **Command-line tools:** All product scenarios can be exercised at the command-line.
trans-unit.target: **命令列工具︰**所有產品案例都可以在命令列操作。

trans-unit.source: **Compatible:** .NET Core is compatible with .NET Framework, Xamarin and Mono, via the [.NET Standard Library](../standard/library.md).
trans-unit.target: **相容︰**.NET Core 透過 [.NET Standard Library](../standard/library.md) (.NET 標準程式庫) 與 .NET Framework、Xamarin 及 Mono 相容。

trans-unit.source: **Open source:** The .NET Core platform is open source, using MIT and Apache 2 licenses.
trans-unit.target: **開放原始碼︰**.NET Core 平台是開放原始碼，使用 MIT 和 Apache 2 授權。

trans-unit.source: Documentation is licensed under [CC-BY](http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/).
trans-unit.target: 請在 [CC-BY](http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/) 下取得文件授權。

trans-unit.source: .NET Core is a [.NET Foundation](http://www.dotnetfoundation.org/) project.
trans-unit.target: .NET core 是 [.NET Foundation](http://www.dotnetfoundation.org/) 專案。

trans-unit.source: **Supported by Microsoft:** .NET Core is supported by Microsoft, per [.NET Core Support](https://www.microsoft.com/net/core/support/)
trans-unit.target: **受 Microsoft 支援︰**.NET Core 依照 [.NET Core 支援](https://www.microsoft.com/net/core/support/) 受 Microsoft 支援。

trans-unit.source: Composition
trans-unit.target: 組合

trans-unit.source: .NET Core is composed of the following parts:
trans-unit.target: .NET Core 由下列部分組成：

trans-unit.source: A [.NET runtime](https://github.com/dotnet/coreclr), which provides a type system, assembly loading, a garbage collector, native interop and other basic services.
trans-unit.target: 一個 [.NET 執行階段](https://github.com/dotnet/coreclr)，提供類型系統、組件載入、記憶體回收行程、原生 Interop 及其他基本服務。

trans-unit.source: A set of [framework libraries](https://github.com/dotnet/corefx), which provide primitive data types, app composition types and fundamental utilities.
trans-unit.target: 一組 [Framework 程式庫](https://github.com/dotnet/corefx)，提供基本資料類型、應用程式組合類型及基本的公用程式。

trans-unit.source: A [set of SDK tools](https://github.com/dotnet/cli) and [language compilers](https://github.com/dotnet/roslyn) that enable the base developer experience, available in the [.NET Core SDK](sdk.md).
trans-unit.target: [SDK 工具組](https://github.com/dotnet/cli)及[語言編譯器](https://github.com/dotnet/roslyn)，提供基本的開發人員體驗，可在 [.NET Core SDK](sdk.md) 中取得。

trans-unit.source: The 'dotnet' app host, which is used to launch .NET Core apps.
trans-unit.target: 'Dotnet' 應用程式主機，用來啟動 .NET Core 應用程式。

trans-unit.source: It selects the runtime and hosts the runtime, provides an assembly loading policy and launches the app.
trans-unit.target: 它會選取執行階段及裝載執行階段、提供組件載入原則，然後啟動應用程式。

trans-unit.source: The same host is also used to launch SDK tools in much the same way.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以差不多的方式用相同的主機啟動 SDK 工具。

trans-unit.source: Languages
trans-unit.target: 語言

trans-unit.source: The C# and F# languages (Visual Basic is coming) can be used to write applications and libraries for .NET Core.
trans-unit.target: C# 和 F# 語言 (Visual Basic 即將加入) 可用來撰寫 .NET Core 應用程式和程式庫。

trans-unit.source: The compilers run on .NET Core, enabling you to develop for .NET Core anywhere it runs.
trans-unit.target: 在 .NET Core 上執行的編譯器，讓您在可以執行 .NET Core 的任何地方進行開發。

trans-unit.source: In general, you will not use the compilers directly, but indirectly using the SDK tools.
trans-unit.target: 一般情況下，您不會直接使用編譯器，而是使用 SDK 工具間接使用它。

trans-unit.source: The C# and F# compilers and the .NET Core tools are or can be integrated into several text editors and IDEs, including Visual Studio, [Visual Studio Code](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=ms-vscode.csharp), Sublime Text and Vim, making .NET Core development an option in your favorite coding environment and OS.
trans-unit.target: C# 和 F# 編譯器和 .NET Core 工具已或可以整合至數個文字編輯器和 IDE 中，包括 Visual Studio、[Visual Studio Code](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=ms-vscode.csharp)、Sublime Text 和 Vim，讓 .NET Core 開發成為您最愛的編碼環境和作業系統的選項。

trans-unit.source: This integration is provided, in part, by the good folks of the [OmniSharp project](http://www.omnisharp.net/).
trans-unit.target: 這項整合有部分是由 [OmniSharp 專案](http://www.omnisharp.net/)的熱心人士提供。

trans-unit.source: .NET APIs and Compatibility
trans-unit.target: .NET API 和相容性

trans-unit.source: .NET Core can be thought of as a cross-platform version of the .NET Framework, at the layer of the .NET Framework Base Class Libraries (BCL).
trans-unit.target: .NET Core 可以視為 .NET Framework 基底類別庫 (BCL) 層的 .NET Framework 跨平台版本。

trans-unit.source: It implements the [.NET Standard Library](../standard/library.md) specification.
trans-unit.target: 它會實作 [.NET 標準程式庫](../standard/library.md) 規格。

trans-unit.source: .NET Core provides a subset of the APIs that are available in the .NET Framework or Mono/Xamarin.
trans-unit.target: .NET Core 提供可在 .NET Framework 或 Mono/Xamarin 中取得的 API 子集。

trans-unit.source: In some cases, types are not fully implemented (some members are not available or have been moved).
trans-unit.target: 在某些情況下不會實作全部類型 (某些成員不提供或已搬遷)。

trans-unit.source: Look at the [.NET Core roadmap](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/master/roadmap.md) to learn more about the .NET Core API roadmap.
trans-unit.target: 若要深入了解 .NET Core API 藍圖，請參閱 [.NET Core roadmap](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/master/roadmap.md)。

trans-unit.source: Relationship to the .NET Standard Library
trans-unit.target: .NET 標準程式庫的關聯性

trans-unit.source: The [.NET Standard Library](../standard/library.md) is an API spec that describes the consistent set of .NET APIs that developers can expect in each .NET implementation.
trans-unit.target: [.NET 標準程式庫](../standard/library.md) 是一種 API 規格，描述開發人員在每個 .NET 實作中預期出現的一組一致的 .NET API。

trans-unit.source: .NET implementations need to implement this spec in order to be considered .NET Standard Library compliant and to support libraries that target the .NET Standard Library.
trans-unit.target: .NET 實作必須實作此規格，才會被視為符合 .NET 標準程式庫，可以支援以 .NET 標準程式庫為目標的程式庫。

trans-unit.source: .NET Core implements the .NET Standard Library, and therefore supports .NET Standard Libraries.
trans-unit.target: .NET Core 因為實作 .NET 標準程式庫，所以可以支援 .NET 標準程式庫。

trans-unit.source: Workloads
trans-unit.target: 工作負載

trans-unit.source: By itself, .NET Core includes a single application model -- console apps -- which is useful for tools, local services and text-based games.
trans-unit.target: .NET Core 本身就包含單一的應用程式模型：主控台應用程式，對工具、本機服務和文字型遊戲都極有幫助。

trans-unit.source: Additional application models have been built on top of .NET Core to extend its functionality, such as:
trans-unit.target: 其他應用程式模型早已建置在 .NET Core 以擴充其功能，例如︰

trans-unit.source: [ASP.NET Core](http://asp.net)
trans-unit.target: [ASP.NET Core](http://asp.net)

trans-unit.source: [Windows 10 Universal Windows Platform (UWP)](https://developer.microsoft.com/windows)
trans-unit.target: [Windows 10 通用 Windows 平台 (UWP)](https://developer.microsoft.com/windows)

trans-unit.source: [Xamarin.Forms](https://www.xamarin.com/forms)
trans-unit.target: [Xamarin.Forms](https://www.xamarin.com/forms)

trans-unit.source: Open Source
trans-unit.target: 開啟原始檔

trans-unit.source: [.NET Core](https://github.com/dotnet/core) is open source (MIT license) and was contributed to the [.NET Foundation](http://dotnetfoundation.org) by Microsoft in 2014.
trans-unit.target: [.NET Core](https://github.com/dotnet/core) 是開放原始碼 (MIT 授權)，Microsoft 已於 2014 年提供給 [.NET Foundation](http://dotnetfoundation.org)。

trans-unit.source: It is now one of the most active .NET Foundation projects.
trans-unit.target: 它現在是最常使用的 .NET Foundation 專案之一。

trans-unit.source: It can be freely adopted by individuals and companies, including for personal, academic or commercial purposes.
trans-unit.target: 可供個人和公司行號自由運用於個人、學術或商業用途。

trans-unit.source: Multiple companies use .NET Core as part of apps, tools, new platforms and hosting services.
trans-unit.target: 很多公司將 .NET Core 用為應用程式、工具、新平台及裝載服務的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Some of these companies make significant contributions to .NET Core on GitHub and provide guidance on the product direction as part of the [.NET Foundation Technical Steering Group](http://www.dotnetfoundation.org/blog/tsg-welcome).
trans-unit.target: 這些公司有些在 GitHub 上對 .NET Core 貢獻良多，為產品方向提供指引，成為 [.NET Foundation Technical Steering Group](http://www.dotnetfoundation.org/blog/tsg-welcome) 的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Acquisition
trans-unit.target: 擷取

trans-unit.source: .NET Core is distributed in two main ways, as packages on NuGet.org and as standalone distributions.
trans-unit.target: .NET Core 有兩大散發方式，一種是 NuGet.org 的封裝，一種是獨立散發。

trans-unit.source: Distributions
trans-unit.target: 分佈

trans-unit.source: You can download .NET Core at the [.NET Core Getting Started](https://www.microsoft.com/net/core) page.
trans-unit.target: 您可以在 [.NET Core 快速入門](https://www.microsoft.com/net/core)頁面下載 .NET Core。

trans-unit.source: The *Microsoft .NET Core* distribution includes the CoreCLR runtime, associated libraries, a console application host and the `dotnet` app launcher.
trans-unit.target: *Microsoft .NET Core* 散發包含 CoreCLR 執行階段、相關程式庫、主控台應用程式主機和 `dotnet` 應用程式啟動程式。

trans-unit.source: It is described by the [`Microsoft.NETCore.App`](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Microsoft.NETCore.App) metapackage.
trans-unit.target: 它是由 [`Microsoft.NETCore.App`](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Microsoft.NETCore.App) 中繼套件所描述。

trans-unit.source: The *Microsoft .NET Core SDK* distribution includes .NET Core and a set of tools for restoring NuGet packages and compiling and building apps.
trans-unit.target: *Microsoft .NET Core SDK* 散發包含 .NET Core 和一組還原 NuGet 封裝及編譯與建置應用程式的工具。

trans-unit.source: Typically, you will first install the .NET Core SDK to get started with .NET Core development.
trans-unit.target: 通常您會先安裝 .NET Core SDK 開始使用 .NET Core 開發。

trans-unit.source: You may choose to install additional .NET Core (perhaps pre-release) builds.
trans-unit.target: 您可以選擇安裝其他的 .NET Core (或許是發行前版本) 組建。

trans-unit.source: Packages
trans-unit.target: 封裝

trans-unit.source: [.NET Core Packages](packages.md) contain the .NET Core runtime and libraries (reference assemblies and implementations).
trans-unit.target: [.NET Core 封裝](packages.md)包含 .NET Core 執行階段和程式庫 (參考組件和實作)。

trans-unit.source: For example, [System.Net.Http](https://www.nuget.org/packages/System.Net.Http/).
trans-unit.target: 例如，[System.Net.Http](https://www.nuget.org/packages/System.Net.Http/)。

trans-unit.source: [.NET Core Metapackages](packages.md) describe various layers and app-models by referencing the appropriate set of versioned library packages.
trans-unit.target: [.NET Core 中繼套件](packages.md)藉由參考適當的建立版本的程式庫封裝集合，描述各種層級和應用程式模型。

trans-unit.source: Architecture
trans-unit.target: 架構

trans-unit.source: .NET Core is a cross-platform .NET implementation.
trans-unit.target: .NET Core 是跨平台的 .NET 實作。

trans-unit.source: The primary architectural concerns unique to .NET Core are related to providing platform-specific implementations for supported platforms.
trans-unit.target: .NET Core 唯一的主要架構考量，是關於為支援的平台提供特定平台的實作。

trans-unit.source: Environments
trans-unit.target: 環境

trans-unit.source: .NET Core is supported by Microsoft on Windows, macOS and Linux.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft 在 Windows、macOS 及 Linux 上都支援 .NET Core。

trans-unit.source: On Linux, Microsoft primarily supports .NET Core running on Red Hat Enterprise Linux (RHEL) and Debian distribution families.
trans-unit.target: 在 Linux 上，Microsoft 主要支援 .NET Core 在running on Red Hat Enterprise Linux (RHEL) 及 Debian 散發系列上執行。

trans-unit.source: .NET Core currently supports X64 CPUs.
trans-unit.target: .NET Core 目前支援 X64 CPU。

trans-unit.source: On Windows, X86 is also supported.
trans-unit.target: Windows 上也支援 X86。

trans-unit.source: ARM64 and ARM32 are in progress.
trans-unit.target: ARM64 和 ARM32 正在進行中。

trans-unit.source: The [.NET Core Roadmap](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/master/roadmap.md) provides more detailed information on workload and OS and CPU environment support and plans.
trans-unit.target: [.NET Core Roadmap](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/master/roadmap.md) 提供更詳盡的工作負載及作業系統和 CPU 環境支援與方案資訊。

trans-unit.source: Other companies or groups may support .NET Core for other app types and environment.
trans-unit.target: 其他公司或群組可能支援其他應用程式類型和環境的 .NET Core。

trans-unit.source: Designed for Adaptability
trans-unit.target: 可適性設計

trans-unit.source: .NET Core has been built as a very similar but unique product relative to other .NET products.
trans-unit.target: .NET Core 近似其他 .NET 產品，但保有獨特性。

trans-unit.source: It has been designed to enable broad adaptability to new platforms, for new workloads and with new compiler toolchains.
trans-unit.target: 它的設計使它具有最大的可適性，能夠適應新的平台、新的工作負載和新的編譯器工具鏈。

trans-unit.source: It has several OS and CPU ports in progress and may be ported to many more.
trans-unit.target: 目前正在建構數個作業系統和 CPU 連接埠，可能會移轉更多。

trans-unit.source: An example is the [LLILC](https://github.com/dotnet/llilc) project, which is an early prototype of native compilation for .NET Core via the [LLVM](http://llvm.org/) compiler.
trans-unit.target: [LLILC](https://github.com/dotnet/llilc) 專案即為一例，這是透過 [LLVM](http://llvm.org/) 編譯器的 .NET Core 原生編譯早期原型。

trans-unit.source: The product is broken into several pieces, enabling the various parts to be adapted to new platforms on different schedules.
trans-unit.target: 產品分成幾個部分，讓不同的部分適用於新平台的不同排程。

trans-unit.source: The runtime and platform-specific foundational libraries must be ported as a unit.
trans-unit.target: 執行階段和特定平台基本程式庫必須移轉為一個單位。

trans-unit.source: Platform-agnostic libraries should work as-is on all platforms, by construction.
trans-unit.target: 無特定平台程式庫在所有平台都應該按建構照原樣運作。

trans-unit.source: There is a project bias to reducing platform-specific implementations to increase developer efficiency, preferring platform-neutral C# code whenever an algorithm or API can be implemented in-full or in-part that way.
trans-unit.target: 減少特定平台實作的專案偏差會提高開發人員的效率，只要能全部或部分以該方式實作演算法或 API，就偏好非平台相關的 C# 程式碼。

trans-unit.source: People commonly ask how .NET Core is implemented in order to support multiple operating systems.
trans-unit.target: 人們常問如何實作 .NET Core 以支援多個作業系統。

trans-unit.source: They typically ask if there are separate implementations or if [conditional compilation](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Conditional_compilation) is used.
trans-unit.target: 他們通常會問是否有不同的實作，或是否使用[條件式編譯](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Conditional_compilation)。

trans-unit.source: It's both, with a strong bias towards conditional compilation.
trans-unit.target: 都有，是強式偏差趨向條件式編譯。

trans-unit.source: You can see in the chart below that the vast majority of [CoreFX](https://github.com/dotnet/corefx) is platform-neutral code that is shared across all platforms.
trans-unit.target: 如以下圖表所示，[CoreFX](https://github.com/dotnet/corefx) 絕大部分是跨所有平台共用的非平台相關程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Platform-neutral code can be implemented as a single portable assembly that be used on all platforms.
trans-unit.target: 非平台相關程式碼可以實作為單一的可攜式組件，用在所有平台上。

trans-unit.source: CoreFX: Lines of Code per Platform
trans-unit.target: CoreFX︰每個平台各有程式碼行

trans-unit.source: Windows and Unix implementations are similar in size.
trans-unit.target: Windows 與 Unix 實作大小相近。

trans-unit.source: Windows has a larger implementation since CoreFX implements some Windows-only features, such as [Microsoft.Win32.Registry](https://github.com/dotnet/corefx/tree/master/src/Microsoft.Win32.Registry) but does not yet implement any Unix-only concepts.
trans-unit.target: Windows 實作較大，因為 CoreFX 會實作一些 Windows 專用功能，例如 [Microsoft.Win32.Registry](https://github.com/dotnet/corefx/tree/master/src/Microsoft.Win32.Registry)，但尚未實作任何 Unix 專有的概念。

trans-unit.source: You will also see that the majority of the Linux and macOS implementations are shared across a Unix implementation, while the Linux- and macOS-specific implementations are roughly similar in size.
trans-unit.target: 您也會看到大多數的 Linux 和 macOS 實作會跨 Unix 實作共用，因此 Linux 和 macOS 特定實作的大小差相彷彿。

trans-unit.source: There are a mix of platform-specific and platform-neutral libraries in .NET Core.
trans-unit.target: .NET Core 混用特定平台和非平台相關程式庫。

trans-unit.source: You can see the pattern in a few examples:
trans-unit.target: 您可以在幾個範例中看到模式︰

trans-unit.source: [CoreCLR](https://github.com/dotnet/coreclr) is platform-specific.
trans-unit.target: [CoreCLR](https://github.com/dotnet/coreclr) 是特定平台型的。

trans-unit.source: It's built in C/C++, so is platform-specific by construction.
trans-unit.target: 它以 C/C++ 建置，所以依建構而言是特定平台。

trans-unit.source: [System.IO](https://github.com/dotnet/corefx/tree/master/src/System.IO) and [System.Security.Cryptography.Algorithms](https://github.com/dotnet/corefx/tree/master/src/System.Security.Cryptography.Algorithms) are platform-specific, given that the storage and cryptography APIs differ significantly on each OS.
trans-unit.target: [System.IO](https://github.com/dotnet/corefx/tree/master/src/System.IO) 和 [System.Security.Cryptography.Algorithms](https://github.com/dotnet/corefx/tree/master/src/System.Security.Cryptography.Algorithms) 是特定平台型，設儲存體和密碼編譯 API 在每個作業系統上有巨大差異。

trans-unit.source: [System.Collections](https://github.com/dotnet/corefx/tree/master/src/System.Collections) and [System.Linq](https://github.com/dotnet/corefx/tree/master/src/System.Linq) are platform-neutral, given that they create and operate over data structures.
trans-unit.target: [System.Collections](https://github.com/dotnet/corefx/tree/master/src/System.Collections) 和 [System.Linq](https://github.com/dotnet/corefx/tree/master/src/System.Linq) 是非關平台型，設它們在資料結構上建立與操作。

trans-unit.source: Comparisons to other .NET Platforms
trans-unit.target: 其他 .NET 平台的比較

trans-unit.source: It is perhaps easiest to understand the size and shape of .NET Core by comparing it to existing .NET platforms.
trans-unit.target: 比較 .NET Core 和現有的 .NET 平台，可能最容易了解 .NET Core 的大小和形態。

trans-unit.source: Comparison with .NET Framework
trans-unit.target: 與 .NET Framework 的比較

trans-unit.source: The .NET platform was first announced by Microsoft in 2000 and then evolved from there.
trans-unit.target: .NET 平台最早由 Microsoft 於 2000 年散發，從此開始發展。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework has been the primary .NET product produced by Microsoft during that 15+ year span.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 是 Microsoft 在 15 來年間生產的主要 .NET 產品。

trans-unit.source: The major differences between .NET Core and the .NET Framework:
trans-unit.target: .NET Core 和 .NET Framework 的主要差異︰

trans-unit.source: **App-models** -- .NET Core does not support all the .NET Framework app-models, in part because many of them are built on Windows technologies, such as WPF (built on top of DirectX).
trans-unit.target: **應用程式模型**：.NET Core 不支援所有的 .NET Framework 應用程式模型，部分是因為其中大部分是建置在 Windows 技術上，例如 WPF (以 DirectX 為建置基礎)。

trans-unit.source: The console and ASP.NET Core app-models are supported by both .NET Core and .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: .NET Core 和 .NET Framework 都支援主控台和 ASP.NET Core 應用程式模型。

trans-unit.source: **APIs** -- .NET Core contains many of the same, but fewer, APIs as the .NET Framework, and with a different factoring (assembly names are different; type shape differs in key cases).
trans-unit.target: **API**：.NET Core 包含許多和 .NET Framework 相同但較少的 API，且有不同的分解 (組件名稱不同，重要案例的類型圖案不同)。

trans-unit.source: These differences currently typically require changes to port source to .NET Core.
trans-unit.target: 這些差異目前通常需要變更 .NET Core 的移轉來源。

trans-unit.source: .NET Core implements the [.NET Standard Library](../standard/library.md) API, which will grow to include more of the .NET Framework BCL API over time.
trans-unit.target: .NET Core 實作 [.NET 標準程式庫](../standard/library.md) API，隨著時間會成長到能包含更多的 .NET Framework BCL API。

trans-unit.source: **Subsystems** -- .NET Core implements a subset of the subsystems in the .NET Framework, with the goal of a simpler implementation and programming model.
trans-unit.target: **子系統**：.NET Core 在 .NET Framework 中實作子系統的子集，目標是更簡單的實作和程式設計模型。

trans-unit.source: For example, Code Access Security (CAS) is not supported, while reflection is supported.
trans-unit.target: 例如，不支援程式碼存取安全性 (CAS)，但支援反映。

trans-unit.source: **Platforms** -- The .NET Framework supports Windows and Windows Server while .NET Core also supports macOS and Linux.
trans-unit.target: **平台**：.NET Framework 支援 Windows 和 Windows Server，但 .NET Core 也支援 macOS 及 Linux。

trans-unit.source: **Open Source** -- .NET Core is open source, while a [read-only subset of the .NET Framework](https://github.com/microsoft/referencesource) is open source.
trans-unit.target: **開放原始碼**：.NET Core 是開放原始碼，同時[唯讀的 .NET Framework 子集](https://github.com/microsoft/referencesource)也是開放原始碼。

trans-unit.source: While .NET Core is unique and has significant differences to the .NET Framework and other .NET platforms, it is straightforward to share code, using either source or binary sharing techniques.
trans-unit.target: 雖然 .NET Core 具有唯一性，且與 .NET Framework 及其他 .NET 平台有顯著差異，卻可以直接共用程式碼，使用來源或二進位共用技術。

trans-unit.source: Comparison with Mono
trans-unit.target: 與 Mono 的比較

trans-unit.source: [Mono](http://www.mono-project.com/) is the original cross-platform and [open source](https://github.com/mono/mono) .NET implementation, first shipping in 2004.
trans-unit.target: [Mono](http://www.mono-project.com/) 是原始的跨平台和[開放原始碼](https://github.com/mono/mono) .NET 實作，首次發送為 2004 年。

trans-unit.source: It can be thought of as a community clone of the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 它可以視為 .NET Framework 的社群複製體。

trans-unit.source: The Mono project team relied on the open [.NET standards](https://github.com/dotnet/coreclr/blob/master/Documentation/project-docs/dotnet-standards.md) (notably ECMA 335) published by Microsoft in order to provide a compatible implementation.
trans-unit.target: Mono 專案小組依賴 Microsoft 為提供相容實作而發行的開放 [.NET 標準](https://github.com/dotnet/coreclr/blob/master/Documentation/project-docs/dotnet-standards.md) (特別是 ECMA 335)。

trans-unit.source: The major differences between .NET Core and Mono:
trans-unit.target: .NET Core 和 Mono 的主要差異︰

trans-unit.source: **App-models** -- Mono supports a subset of the .NET Framework app-models (for example, Windows Forms) and some additional ones (for example, [Xamarin.iOS](https://www.xamarin.com/platform)) through the Xamarin product.
trans-unit.target: **應用程式模型**：單聲道透過 Xamarin 產品支援 .NET Framework 應用程式模型的子集 (例如，Windows Forms) 和一些其他子集 (例如，[Xamarin.iOS](https://www.xamarin.com/platform))。

trans-unit.source: .NET Core doesn't support these.
trans-unit.target: .NET Core 不支援這些。

trans-unit.source: **APIs** -- Mono supports a [large subset](http://docs.go-mono.com/?link=root%3a%2fclasslib) of the .NET Framework APIs, using the same assembly names and factoring.
trans-unit.target: **API**：Mono 使用相同的組件名稱及分解，支援 .NET Framework API 的[大型子集](http://docs.go-mono.com/?link=root%3a%2fclasslib)。

trans-unit.source: **Platforms** -- Mono supports many platforms and CPUs.
trans-unit.target: **平台**：Mono支援許多平台和 CPU。

trans-unit.source: **Open Source** -- Mono and .NET Core both use the MIT license and are .NET Foundation projects.
trans-unit.target: **開放原始碼**：Mono 與 .NET Core 都使用 MIT 授權且都是 .NET Foundation 專案。

trans-unit.source: **Focus** -- The primary focus of Mono in recent years is mobile platforms, while .NET Core is focused on cloud workloads.
trans-unit.target: **焦點**：Mono 近年來的主要焦點是行動平台，而 .NET Core 則著重於雲端工作負載。
